mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_UseHistory (member_num, phone_num, category_cd, merchant_num, brokerage, payment_date_time, use_start_date_time, use_end_date_time, reservation_status) VALUES (#{memberNum}, #{phoneNum}, #{categoryCd}, #{merchantNum}, #{brokerage}, NOW(), #{useStartDateTime}, #{useEndDateTime}, #{reservationStatus})
